page.title: 04WEATHER
page.content: The weather changes every day. Today the weather has been sunny with sun showers. The date is the eleventh of June. Michael and I have measured the temperatures.We do this in all the classrooms, hall, and even the dining_room of our school.The outside temperatures are always colder than the inside temperatures. The rainfall in this area is below the national average, and is usually about 60cm. The prevailing wind is westerly, and is usually light to moderate. The area does not have a great deal of snow, usually being affected last in the country. Most roads are kept open throughout the winter
